about_the_game:
Kanjozoku - Wangan Runners



Start your turbocharged engine, turn off the TC, and start driving in Kanjozoku - Wangan Runners, a sequel to the thrilling street racing saga. Set in the buzzing street culture of '90s Japan, explore over 100+ km of open highways, parking lots, and shadowy tunnels. The game introduces a variety of new modes like sprint races, drag competitions, high-speed toll road terminals, intense police pursuits, eliminator challenges, time attacks, drift events, and duels, all available for online play.



Connect with the community in a brand-new in-game forum, showcasing player profiles with their cherished cars and achievements. Engage in car meets, share screenshots, guides, and participate in discussions and race events, all within a vibrant social hub.

Experience unparalleled realism with a complete overhaul of engine sounds, enhancing the raw emotion of JDM machines. Witness graphical enhancements built from the ground up, along with revamped physics for a truly immersive driving experience. Fine-tune your ride with new performance upgrades and express your style with extensive modding support for cars, wheels, engines, vinyls, and sounds.



Catered to JDM fans, anime enthusiasts, and fans of the Wangan, Kanjozoku - Wangan Runners is where passion meets pavement in an epic celebration of speed and culture. Join us on the streets where the spirit of '90s racing lives on.

Modding Support!


It offers a deep modding experience where players can create cars, wheels, and engines. Modify your vehicle's appearance with vinyls, change the UI, and even tweak engine sounds to your taste. This mod support allows you to personalize every aspect of your racing experience.

name: Kanjozoku - Wangan Runners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Forged Pistons, Ball-bearing Turbo, Sequential Gearbox, RB26 under the hood! Ignite your passion for '90s Japanese Kanjo street racing in Kanjozoku - Wangan Runners. Race across 100+ km of open roads, from highways to tunnels and connect with players in a dynamic online community.
